text:
Created attachment 32049
proper.diff

Implement and test the PROPER function. I checked some Unicode letters too, but I don't know if it behaves exactly as Excel in all Unicode (corner)cases.
creator: patrick.zimmermann@haltec.de
dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: Unfortunately this does not apply cleanly, Character.isAlphabetic() was added in Java 7, however we still want to be compatible with Java 6 as well, can you redo the patch with this implemented slightly different so it still works with Java 6 as well?

Created attachment 32109
proper_java6_comp.diff

Replaced Character class usage with a regular expression.
creator: patrick.zimmermann@haltec.de

text: Applied as r1633215, I had to adjust the regular expression as "\P{IsAlphabetic}" is not available in Java 6, I used \P{IsL}, according to the unit test this has the same effect.
creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
